Project import: line reading code correction. Now uses HoughLineP from OpenCV. Watch() and continuous_watch() updated. Obtained lines must still be cleaned with matrix operation (vertical only).

Project import: Line reading code correction. Now uses HoughLineP from OpenCV. Watch() and continuous_watch() updated. Line repetition analysis now supported. Lines are not sent to surr. Eng. as of right now.
Project import: Temporary modification for connection between Python3.7 and C++ for lines filtering time saving (Code is running but not as expected).
Project import: Temporary modification for connection between Python3.7 and C++ for lines filtering time saving (Code is running but not as expected).
Project import: Modification for connection between Python3.7 and C for lines filtering. Functionnal code.
Project import: Track line filter C library code import as .so file. Must be compiled from track_line_filter.pyx (Cython code) with Cython compiler.

Project import: Motion eng - Controller name modif. Surround eng - Data request from input devices added. Lines camera - Now returns filtered lines corresponding to borders. Guidance - Added steering control. Code is functionnal with good mapping. Controller : Modif. name from management. Added links to Engineers and __main__

Project import: Motion eng - Controller name modif. Surround eng - Data request from input devices added. Lines camera - Now returns filtered lines corresponding to borders. Guidance - Added steering control. Code is functionnal with good mapping. Controller : Modif. name from management. Added links to Engineers and __main__
Project import: Modifications for transfert from Tinker board S to Rasp PI 4 and code modif. for PCA9685 PWM control. UNVERIFIED CODE. Might not work properly as off right now.
Project import: Modifications for transfer from Tinker board S to Rasp PI 4 and code modif. for PCA9685 PWM control. Code does not work properly as off right now. XL-5 opening sequence not programmed

Project import: Modifications for transfer from Tinker board S to Rasp PI 4 and code modif. for PCA9685 PWM control. Steering and speed control is functionnal. Mapped values range from 1 to 2 ms for pulses.

Project import: Modifications for transfer from Tinker board S to Rasp PI 4 and code modif. for PCA9685 PWM control. Steering and speed control is functionnal. Mapped values range from 1 to 2 ms for pulses.
Camera capture issues fixed.

Added functionality such as keyboard remote control via SSH and control via a PID controller. Small and simple console user interface as been implemented. VAALERIE should be semi autonomous on this release. Tests required
Follow mode progress and Garmin LIDARLite V3 implementation.
Follow mode progress and Garmin LIDARLite V3 implementation.
Autonomy update. Includes: Self driving up to 2m/s(tested) (PID controller), untuned follow mode and keyboard control. This is the fastest update yet.

Autonomy update. Includes: Self driving up to 3m/s(tested) (PID controller), tuned follow mode with PID control and keyboard control. This is the fastest update yet. This update could be used as final update though improvements could be done.

Autonomy update. Includes: Self driving up to 3m/s(tested) (PID controller), tuned follow mode with PID control and keyboard control. This is the fastest update yet. This update could be used as final update though improvements could be done. Added Data collection
